document_data.name: Werehyena
document_data.mainbody:
first        =
}}'''Werehyenas''' were humans in [[Zakhara]] who could transform into a hyena-like form.
document_data.Description:
Most werehyenas were male and usually had long shaggy hair. The long hair concealed a second mouth located at the base of the skull. Werehyenas went to great lengths to keep this hidden.

Their hyena form was usually {{SI|6|ft|long=yes}} long and had golden fur on their back with black fur on their belly and feet.
document_data.Behavior: Werehyena's had an innate, deep sense of fear towards fires. Because of this, flaming torches were often used to keep them at bay.
document_data.Abilities: Werehyenas could not be harmed by weapons unless there were [[magical item|magical]] or constructed of [[iron]]. They were also known to be immune to enchantment or charm [[spell]]s.
document_data.Combat: In human form, werehyenas used their special charm powers to avoid combat. In canine form they attacked with a savage bite that could lock on to a victim.

Ecology.Diet: Werehyenas preyed on gullible humans whenever they could. They were also adept scavengers and ate anything they could find to survive.
Ecology.Homelands: Beyond the land of Zakhara, werehyenas could be found in some areas of the [[Domains of Dread]].
Ecology.Relationships: While in human form, werehyenas often infiltrated villages and lured victims out to where the rest of their pack was waiting.

document_data.Known Werehyenas:
* [[Batul]], one of many werehyenas that were kept as pets by the [[dao]] [[Ynadin]].<ref>
* [[Jakkob]], a captured werehyena who fled to [[Yhep]] in the [[Lake of Steam]].<ref name=EotSS-p170">
